mapper.select: select b.cs_no, cs_name, cs_camp_fname, b.r_no, b.mc_id, b.r_cancel, b.r_checkin, b.r_checkout , b.r_price from camping_spot cs, (select cs_no, a.r_no, a.mc_id, a.r_cancel, a.r_checkin, a.r_checkout ,a.r_price from camping_room cr, (select cr_no, r_no, mc_id, r_cancel, TO_CHAR(r_checkin,'YYYY-MM-DD') r_checkin, TO_CHAR(r_checkout,'YYYY-MM-DD') r_checkout , r_price from reservation where mc_id = #{mc_id})a where cr.cr_no = a.cr_no) b where cs.cs_no = b.cs_no order by b.r_checkin desc

select cs_camp_fname, cs_no, cs_name , r_checkin ,r_checkout from (select cs.cs_camp_fname, cs.cs_no, cs.cs_name , res.r_checkin ,res.r_checkout from reservation res, camping_room cr, camping_spot cs where cs.cs_no = cr.cs_no and cr.cr_no = res.cr_no and res.mc_id = 'test1234') where to_char(r_checkout, 'yyyy-mm-dd') < to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
select mc_fname, mc_point , mc_name from member_customer where mc_id = #{mc_id}
select cw_no, mc_name,cs_name, cs_camp_fname, cs_addr_remain from camping_wish cw, member_customer mc, camping_spot cs where cw.mc_id = mc.mc_id and cw.cs_no = cs.cs_no and mc.mc_id = #{mc_id}
